column4: is it better to do the things easyubuntu can do yourself? or is it recommended to go ahead and just use the program
i think its better to do the steps yourself, you will learn more and only install stuff you need/want

most programs will appear on the menu 'naturally'. however there is a program called alacarte menu editor which lets you edit menus yourself - the easiest way of launching the editor is with a right click on your top gnome bar
if your using breezy, you may have to find the menu editor in the menus - it will definately be there though
